{{Wired embedded system |brand=Ctera |model=CT-C200 |revision=-1 |asin=B00OJMPNY8;CA; |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |price=499 |est_release_date=October 2009 |pcb_id=YT300B-1.6 |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F2G08U0C-SCB0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU128M8GE-AC |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA II, |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2-Wire RTC IC;Seiko;S35390A;;1;,,, USB 2.0 Controller;NEC;UPD720114;;1;,,, Digital Temperature Sensor w/ Fan Control;National Semiconductor;LM63;;1;,,, Synchronous Single Buck PMW Controller;Chip Advanced Tech;CAT7581;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Voltage Regulator;GlobalTech;GS1117AX;;1;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;2;,,, 0.5A Dual Channel Current-Limited Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2146;;1;,,, P-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP9435GM;;2;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4842;;1;,,, Precision Timer;TI;NE555;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, fan, |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |oui_eth=00:25:25 }} {{TagLine|Cloud Attached Storage Appliance}} :[https://www.ctera.com/help/c200/5.5/index.htm#page/Installations/CSG2.1.1.html Product page]
===Specifications=== *[[Marvell]] 1.2GHz ARM CPU, RAM 512MB DDR2, 256MB Flash, 1x GbE LAN *2x 3.5" HDD SATA I/II (up to 4TB, total 8TB), RAID 0/1/JBOD, 2x USB 2.0
===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/cloud/cloud-storage/126-ctera-c200-reviewed ''CTERA C200 Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
